attributes.action: Make the wearing of bike helmets on push bikes compulsory
attributes.additional_details: So many people still don't wear helmets, or they will get the kids to wear them but not wear themselves.  It is proven that they safe lives and reduce the amount of injury when involved in an accident. Having personally had an accident and being saved from more serious injury by wearing my helmet I know just how good they are and want to save other people from unnecessary harm.
attributes.background: Make it law that all cyclists of all ages must wear helmets when riding

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315987
